update tb_withdrawal set withdrawal = #{withdrawal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alipay_account = #{alipayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alipay_name = #{alipayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from tb_withdrawal ORDER BY status ASC,create_date ASC

select
from tb_withdrawal WHERE (create_by LIKE "%"#{key}"%" or remarks LIKE "%"#{key}"%") AND (alipay_account LIKE "%"#{alipay}"%" or alipay_name LIKE "%"#{alipay}"%") AND status LIKE '%${status}%' AND (create_date BETWEEN '${startDay}' AND '${endDay}') ORDER BY status ASC,create_date ASC
